schemas.description: To be displayed when the machine is started. Machine start is defined as switching on the main power supply or power generation.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: AckFlag
contents.description: Acknowledgement by the operator that he has read the message. (Will be transferred back as soon as the SiteHead is returned to the mine’s computer system with the next protocol exchange. Contains the name of the operator (user name in the Automation system) or simply ACK if automation system does not work with user logins.

contents.name: DispFlag
contents.description: States under which circumstances the line (message) has to be displayed to the operator.

contents.name: DispText
contents.description: Text to be displayed.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: EqpManufact
contents.description: Name of the manufacturer.

contents.name: EqpModel
contents.description: Equipment model describing the model in the specified EqpType. To be stated if required for unequivocal machine type identification.

contents.name: EqpSerNo
contents.description: Serial number of the machine.

contents.name: EqpType
contents.description: Manufacturer internal type name of the machine.

contents.name: EqpInfo
contents.description: Other equipment specific information. Free text.

contents.name: EqpName
contents.description: Used for designation of the machine.

contents.name: EqpSysVer
contents.description: Version Info Automation System / Software.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: DownCompat
contents.description: Downward compatibility of the profile version stated in “version” can be guaranteed down to the version number stated in this attribute. Fixed 2.0.

contents.name: FileCreateDate
contents.description: Date of file creation. This is the date/time stamp for initialization of the Data Set.

contents.name: IRVersion
contents.description: Version of the IREDES main components of the standard. This version number changes any time IREDES top level schemas are modified. Please note to state downward compatibility in the separate Attribute. Type definition see below. Fixed 2.0.

contents.name: ChkSum
contents.description: CRC 32 checksum.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: FileCloseDate
contents.description: Date the file was created.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: IRDownwCompat
contents.description: Earliest version the IREDES Base system version stated in IRVersion is downward compatible to. Since this version, only extensions have been made but no changes affecting compatibility issues (data type changes etc).

contents.name: IRVersion
contents.description: IREDES Base version needed to process this scheme.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: OptionSchema
contents.description: URI for the schema that will extend the IREDES standard. This schema won’t be processed.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: PlanId
contents.description: IREDES internal production plan ID used for reference e.g. by Production Quality data sets basing on a particular production plan.

contents.name: PlanName
contents.description: Plan logical name to identify this specific plan to the human user. Useful to help the operator of a machine to logical identify a specific plan.

contents.name: Comment
contents.description: Comments to the plan for example type of plan, purpose, tools to use.

contents.name: Project
contents.description: Project ID code. To identify the target project for this plan.

contents.name: WorkOrder
contents.description: Work order ID code. To identify the work order associated with this plan.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: EndLogTine
contents.description: End of the reporting period. Date and time when the last entry to this xml-set was made.

contents.name: ReportId
contents.description: Report ID code, to uniquely identify this log report.

contents.name: StartLogTime
contents.description: Start of the reporting period. Date and time when the first entry to this xml-set was made.

contents.name: Comment
contents.description: Project information concerning this log.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: EndLogTime
contents.description: End of the reporting period. Date and time when the last entry to this xml-set was made.

contents.name: ReportId
contents.description: Report ID code, to uniquely identify this log report.

contents.name: StartLogTime
contents.description: Start of the reporting period. Date and time when the first entry to this xml-set was made.

contents.name: Comment
contents.description: Project information concerning this log.

contents.name: OperatorId
contents.description: Identify the operator of the machine for reference.

schemas.description: Time Machine is expected to finish the job.

contents.name: Issuer
contents.description: ID of the person or institute who issued this work order.

contents.name: WorkOrderId
contents.description: Identification of this work order. This ID has nothing to do with the, for example, work plan ID.

contents.name: AssignmentTime
contents.description: Time the execution of the job is expected to take.

contents.name: MachineId
contents.description: Machine assigned to the work.

contents.name: OperatorId
contents.description: Operators assigned to the work.

contents.name: PriorityLevel
contents.description: Priority of the workorder. Level from 1 to 10 as 10 representing top priority.

contents.name: SafetyAdvice
contents.description: Work order shall be carried out. Schema should be defined separately within the IRoptionType.

contents.name: SpecialCondition
contents.description: E.g. electricity will be switched off in some region in mine during operation.

contents.name: SpecialTask
contents.description: Tasks that are not or hard to describe in workorder.

contents.name: Answer
contents.description: See Answer enumeration.

contents.name: Condition
contents.description: Only for 'AcceptedWithCondition' option. Free text field for condition such as 'need consumable', etc.

contents.name: Duration
contents.description: For delayed option only.

contents.name: Reason
contents.description: Place to clarify reasons for delaying or denying the work order.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: LTPPLdrawPtN
contents.description: Name of the draw (load point) accessed in the reported job.

contents.name: LTPPLdumpPtN
contents.description: Name of the dump point in this combination.

contents.name: LTPPLcycl
contents.description: Number of cycles travelled between this point pair during reporting period.

contents.name: LTPPLdist
contents.description: Distance travelled between those two points during reporting period. Accumulated distance of al rounds travelled. Both routes are counted! Accuracy: 0.01 km.

contents.name: LTPPLdrawPtID
contents.description: Electronic (tag) ID of the draw (load point) in this combination (Name in 1.1.1.1).

contents.name: LTPPLdumpPtID
contents.description: Electronic (tag) ID of the draw (load point) in this combination (Name in 1.1.1.1).

contents.name: LTPPLmass
contents.description: Mass transported between this point pair during reporting period in t. Min accuracy: 0.01 t.

contents.name: LTPPLopObserv
contents.description: Operator observations regarding the travel way, load or dump points during reporting period (e.g. loose rock, bad roadway,...). Preliminarily a string, later we can add preselect-lists for easier operator input!

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: LTPPCyclTot
contents.description: Total number of working cycles (rounds) completed during the reporting period.

contents.name: LTPPdistTot
contents.description: Overall distance travelled in during the reporting period. This includes also non-performance related tramming e.g. to workshop. Minimum accuracy required by the standard: 0.1 km.

contents.name: LTPPloadTot
contents.description: Total load carried under all completed working cycles during reporting period. Minimum accuracy required by the standard: 0.01.

contents.name: LTPPwrkDist
contents.description: Total distance travelled in a working mode (as reported by MWorking) during the reporting period.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: LTPPMissEnd
contents.description: End time of the mission. Counting ends when the machine is ready to start the next mission, including all waiting before the next mission can be started.

contents.name: LTPPMisstart
contents.description: Time tag when the mission started.

contents.name: LTPPMtramEnd
contents.description: Tramming end time: Time stamp when the tramming ended at destination point.

contents.name: LTPPMaction
contents.description: Action to be carried out at destination point specified in LTPPMptTo.

contents.name: LTPPMarea
contents.description: ID for the mine area the machine is operating in. Usually both departure and destination points should be located in this area.

contents.name: LTPPMisSeq
contents.description: Sequence number of the mission. Starting at 1 with the first mission in the reporting period.

contents.name: LTPPMopID
contents.description: Operator ID.

contents.name: LTPPMpayld
contents.description: Tonnage of payload carried between start and destination points.

contents.name: LTPPMptFromID
contents.description: Electronic (Tag) ID of the point where the mission originated (tramming started). Electronic ID of the point stated in LTPPMptFromN.

contents.name: LTPPMptFromN
contents.description: Name of the point where the mission originated (tramming started).

contents.name: LTPPMptFromType
contents.description: Type of the point where the mission started.

contents.name: LTPPMptToID
contents.description: Electronic (tag) ID of the point where the mission ended (destination point).

contents.name: LTPPMptToN
contents.description: Name of the destination point, where the tramming finished and the mission ended.

contents.name: LTPPMptToType
contents.description: Type of the point where the mission ended.

contents.name: LTPPMtimeAct
contents.description: Duration of the action carried out at the destination point in LTPPMaction.

contents.name: LTPPMtramDist
contents.description: Tramming distance between start and destination point. Unit: km; Resolution: 0.0001 km (10 cm).

contents.name: LTPPMwaitgen
contents.description: Accumulated waiting time during the mission, excluding the time reported in LTPPMwaitPoint.

contents.name: LTPPMwaitPoint
contents.description: Waiting time for destination point availability.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: LTPPEndTime
contents.description: Mission end time.

contents.name: LTPPStartTime
contents.description: Mission start time.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: BlastDelay
contents.description: Any Delay caused by blasting operations.

contents.name: CantDump
contents.description: Dump point blocked by another machine, boulders or dump shaft filled / truck missing.

contents.name: MineUtils
contents.description: Waiting for mine utilities.

contents.name: NoRock
contents.description: Wait for material to handle - No access to material to load.

contents.name: RoadMaint
contents.description: Waiting for roadway maintenance.

contents.name: Traffic
contents.description: Traffic caused delays: roadway blocked by another machine / cars / other traffic.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: Mworking
contents.description: Machine working.

contents.name: TurnedOff
contents.description: Machine intentionally put in “OFF” state. This state is only counted if the machine is intentionally deactivated by an operator. Observe that a “switch off” while the machine is in “Wait Repair” mode will be counted as “wait repair” until the machine is switched on again.

contents.name: WaitOperator
contents.description: Time the machine waits for operator assistance during the reporting period. See “IREDES Drill Rig profile description” document.

contents.name: WaitProcess
contents.description: Machine waiting for other partners in the process or for process reasons not caused by the machine itself. This may be an (autonomous) machine waiting for access to a shared tramming zone or waiting for access to a dump shaft, a truck to become available etc. See “IREDES Drill Rig profile description” document.

contents.name: WaitRepair
contents.description: Waiting time for repair until the repair is finished and the machine manually is switched on again. See “IREDES Drill Rig profile description” document.

contents.name: WaitSamples
contents.description: Waiting time for external supplies like electric power, network connection for remote control (if not in local operation mode), water, material etc. See “IREDES Drill Rig profile description” document.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.

contents.name: Comment
contents.description: Comments concerning the project can be added here.

contents.name: Signature
contents.description: Project signature.

contents.name: DefaultInstanceBrowseName
contents.description: The default BrowseName for instances of this type.
